titleStmt.title: Introduction to wisedome Banket of sapience. Preceptes of Agapetus.
Ad sapientiam introductio. English
titleStmt.author: Vives, Juan Luis, 1492-1540.
Morison, Richard, Sir, d. 1556.
Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.
Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete in the hous of Tho. Berthelet,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Vives, Juan Luis. Introductio ad sapeintiam. Also reprints "The Bankette of sapience," translated by Sir Thomas Elyot (STC 7630), and "The Preceptes teachyng a prynce his duetie," translated by T. Paynell (STC 193).
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
